description: ChIP-Seq data for 4 alternatively activated macrophage sample(s). 29 run(s), 28 experiment(s), 28 alignment(s). Part of BLUEPRINT release August 2014. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20140811/homo_sapiens/README_chipseq_analysis_ebi_20140811
